definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province

sentences.english: She was asked to draw a picture of her family.
sentences.chinese: 她被要求畫一幅她的家子的丹青。

sentences.english: There is natural water black painting Grand Canyon of wonderful workmanship excelling nature.

sentences.english: Absorbed in painting, you know not old age is coming; indeed, to me wealth and rank are like clouds scudding.
sentences.chinese: 丹青不知老將近，富貴於我如浮雲。

sentences.english: Chen Danqing collected a full set of Wang Zi's "A New History of Art".
sentences.chinese: 陳丹青收藏了王子全套的《美術新編》。

sentences.english: The academies gathered the most excellent painters in the country.

sentences.english: Immediately, Li-niang told Spring Fragrance to fetch her a silk scroll and paints.

sentences.english: Amy's dad guessed a picture book.
sentences.chinese: 艾米的爸爸以爲是一本丹青書。

sentences.english: Besides being a painter, Chen is equally popular for his writings.

definition: poetry and pictorial art/work of art combining pictures and poetry
to write or draw with a brush/to put pen to paper/to write
ink stick/China ink/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/corporal punishment consisting of tattooing characters on the victim's forehead
surname Mo/abbr. for 墨西哥[Mo4 xi1 ge1], Mexico
gongbi, traditional Chinese painting method characterized by meticulous brush technique and detailed description
water from a mountain/mountains and rivers/scenery/landscape
